Token.Abstract: PINCache is a thread safe key/value store designed for persisting temporary objects that are expensive to reproduce, such as downloaded data or the results of slow processing. It is comprised of two self-similar stores, one in memory (PINMemoryCache and one on disk (PINDiskCache.
The name of this cache, used to create the diskCache and also appearing in stack traces.
The name of this cache, used to create the diskCache and also appearing in stack traces.
The name of this cache, used to create the diskCache and also appearing in stack traces.
A concurrent queue on which blocks passed to the asynchronous access methods are run.
A concurrent queue on which blocks passed to the asynchronous access methods are run.
A concurrent queue on which blocks passed to the asynchronous access methods are run.
Synchronously retrieves the total byte count of the diskCache on the shared disk queue.
Synchronously retrieves the total byte count of the diskCache on the shared disk queue.
Synchronously retrieves the total byte count of the diskCache on the shared disk queue.
The underlying disk cache, see PINDiskCache for additional configuration and trimming options.
The underlying disk cache, see PINDiskCache for additional configuration and trimming options.
The underlying disk cache, see PINDiskCache for additional configuration and trimming options.
The underlying memory cache, see PINMemoryCache for additional configuration and trimming options.
The underlying memory cache, see PINMemoryCache for additional configuration and trimming options.
The underlying memory cache, see PINMemoryCache for additional configuration and trimming options.
A shared cache.
Multiple instances with the same name are allowed and can safely access the same data on disk thanks to the magic of seriality. Also used to create the diskCache.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the cache.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new cache with the specified name.

Token.Abstract: Multiple instances with the same name are allowed and can safely access the same data on disk thanks to the magic of seriality. Also used to create the diskCache.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the cache.

Parameter.Name: rootPath
Parameter.Abstract: The path of the cache on disk.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new cache with the specified name.

Token.Abstract: This method determines whether an object is present for the given key in the cache. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block after the object is available, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the concurrentQueue.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently after the containment check happened

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the object for the specified key. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block after the object is available, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the concurrentQueue.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the requested object.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently when the object is available.

Token.Abstract: Stores an object in the cache for the specified key. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block after the object has been stored, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the concurrentQueue.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An object to store in the cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A key to associate with the object. This string will be copied.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently after the object has been stored, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes the object for the specified key. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block after the object has been removed, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the concurrentQueue.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object to be removed.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently after the object has been removed, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache that have not been used since the specified date. This method returns immediately and executes the passed block after the cache has been trimmed, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the concurrentQueue.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: Objects that haven't been accessed since this date are removed from the cache.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently after the cache has been trimmed, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache.This method returns immediately and executes the passed block after the cache has been cleared, potentially in parallel with other blocks on the concurrentQueue.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed concurrently after the cache has been cleared, or nil.

Token.Abstract: This method determines whether an object is present for the given key in the cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if an object is present for the given key in the cache, otherwise NO.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the object for the specified key. This method blocks the calling thread until the object is available. Uses a semaphore to achieve synchronicity on the disk cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The object for the specified key.

Token.Abstract: Stores an object in the cache for the specified key. This method blocks the calling thread until the object has been set. Uses a semaphore to achieve synchronicity on the disk cache.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An object to store in the cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A key to associate with the object. This string will be copied.

Token.Abstract: Removes the object for the specified key. This method blocks the calling thread until the object has been removed. Uses a semaphore to achieve synchronicity on the disk cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The key associated with the object to be removed.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache that have not been used since the specified date. This method blocks the calling thread until the cache has been trimmed. Uses a semaphore to achieve synchronicity on the disk cache.

Parameter.Name: date
Parameter.Abstract: Objects that haven't been accessed since this date are removed from the cache.

Token.Abstract: Removes all objects from the cache. This method blocks the calling thread until the cache has been cleared. Uses a semaphore to achieve synchronicity on the disk cache.
